comments: Wow! Captivating and actually interested in his students. I transferred schools but I don\'t think I\'ll ever forget Dr. E. I wish that I could take him with me to my new school! He\'s a high-quality professor with a ton of knowledge.

I can\'t say enough superlatives about Dr E. He makes every class a joy. I can\'t wait to go to class and spend time listening to his stories and experiences. I learn so... many interesting concepts. For a "old guy" he is also easy on the eyes. Want to learn psy? he is the Man.

If you want to become a therapist that cares and knows what happening in the real world! Take Erikson, he will teach you things that you take into your personal life. I always love coming to class. Never know what he is going to do? phobias - brings a 5 ft snake and shows how to do exposure therapy.

IF YOU ARE SERIOUS ABOUT GOING INTO PSYCHOLOGY. DR E IS YOUR MAN. HE MAKES EACH AND EVERY CLASS SO MUCH FUN AND INFORMATIVE. I HAVE LEARNED SO MUCH INFO - AND WE ARE ONLY 1/2 WAY THROUGH THE COURSE. TAKE HIM YOU WILL NOT BE DISAPPOINTED
Prof Erikson is one of my personal heros. I really really recommend this class. PowerPoints, videos, and his clinical stories make this a got to take class. Take him!

ERIKSON IS SO GOOD. HE IS A PRACTICING PSYCHOTHERAPIST, SO HE HAS A LOT OF EXPERIENCE. I CAN\'T WAIT TO GO TO CLASS. TIME JUST FLYS BY-I WISH I COULD JUST BY HALF AS GOOD AS THIS WONDERFUL PROFESSOR. TAKE HIM, HE WILL CHANGE YOUR LIFE.
I LEARNED SOOOO MUCH FROM ERIKSON. HE IS A PRACTICING THERAPIST SO, HE ALWAYS SUPPORTING HIS TEACHING WITH CLINICAL EXAMPLES. TIME JUST FLYS BY! TAKE HIM AND YOU WILL HAVE A HOOT.

Dr. Erikson is the absolute best!! I was thinking that Nishita was going to teach the class but they brought in Dr. E. and I had such a good semester. Go to class- he keeps it interesting with cool stories and fun powerpoints!!

He has just joined the faculty of the psychology program. What a great teacher, time flys when you are having a good time. He is loaded with experience and great stories. Take Erikson, you will not be disappointed
